seoTitle: Lift Pros | Forklift & Material Handling Service, Sales & Fleet Management
seoDescription: Full-service forklift and material handling equipment partner in Central Valley, CA. Equipment sales, lithium batteries, repair, preventive maintenance, racking, dock doors, and parts.
heroDescription: Equipment sales, lithium battery solutions, preventive maintenance, fleet management, racking, dock doors, and field service across California's Central Valley.

services.title: Battery Solutions
services.description: Premier lithium battery sales and service center. Lead acid rejuvenation with free first sample to prove it works.

services.title: Equipment Sales
services.description: New and used forklifts, scissor lifts, narrow aisle, and cold storage equipment. Authorized TAILIFT dealer.

services.title: Service & Maintenance
services.description: Repair, preventive maintenance programs, fleet management, and mobile field service across the Central Valley.

services.title: Racking & Dock Doors
services.description: Warehouse racking systems and dock door sales, installation, and service. Complete facility solutions.

services.title: Parts Supply
services.description: OEM and aftermarket parts for all major brands. Fast sourcing with real-time availability.

services.title: Junk Lift Haul Away
services.description: Dead forklift or scissor lift? We'll haul it away free at no cost from anywhere in the Central Valley.

batterySplitText: The industry is shifting to lithium and we're leading the charge in the Central Valley. From full fleet conversions to single-unit upgrades, we sell, install, and service every battery. Not ready for lithium? Try our lead acid rejuvenation — free first sample.

whyUs.title: Fast Response Times
whyUs.description: Mobile technicians dispatched across the Central Valley. GPS-tracked service vans so you know when help is arriving.

whyUs.title: Battery Experts
whyUs.description: Premier lithium battery sales and service center. Free battery rejuvenation samples to prove the value before you commit.

whyUs.title: Transparent Pricing
whyUs.description: Detailed job costing on every work order. Labor, parts, and travel broken out clearly. No surprises on your invoice.

whyUs.title: Single Source
whyUs.description: Equipment, batteries, racking, dock doors, parts, and service. One vendor for your entire facility instead of juggling five.

equipmentSplitText: Authorized TAILIFT dealer with new and certified used forklifts, scissor lifts, narrow aisle, and cold storage equipment. We service everything we sell — local support from day one. Dead lift? We'll haul it away free.
bannerText: Racking, dock doors, equipment, batteries, parts, and service — one call.
ctaText: Whether you need a quote, a service call, or want to talk about upgrading your fleet — we're here.
